title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.117 - Poisonous liquids, Class B, referenced to this section
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.117 - Poisonous liquids, Class B, referenced to this section

State Regulations
(a) Poisonous liquids, Class B, listed in
section
1211.150
for reference to this
section, are restricted to a maximum quantity per vehicle of 60 gallons or 1000
pounds gross weight provided, however, such liquids are in metal containers or
cylinders of 100 pounds gross weight, or less. (b) Empty containers which last contained
poisonous liquids, Class B, referenced to this section are not allowed passage
when the quantity and/or container size limitations exceed those described
above. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1211.117

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
